title: Travel Between U.S. and Southern Africa Will Resume, White House Says
content:
1. Travel Between U.S. and Southern Africa Will Resume, White House Says  The New York Times
  2. White House lifting omicron travel ban on southern African countries amid spread in US  Fox News
  3. Biden to lift travel restrictions on southern African countries that were put in place due to Omicron  CNN
  4. Covid omicron spread hasn't stopped domestic travel. Yet some foreigners are banned.  NBC News
  5. Omicron: On New Year eve US go lift travel ban on South Africa, oda African kontris  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Travel Between U.S. and Southern Africa Will Resume, White House Says  The New York Times
White House lifting omicron travel ban on southern African countries amid spread in US  Fox News
Biden to lift travel restrictions on southern African countries that were put in place due to Omicron  CNN
Covid omicron spread hasn't stopped domestic travel. Yet some foreigners are banned.  NBC News
Omicron: On New Year eve US go lift travel ban on South Africa, oda African kontris  BBC News

localize.title: 米国と南部アフリカ間の旅行再開をホワイトハウスが発表
白宫表示美国和南部非洲之间的旅行将恢复。
白宮表示美國和南部非洲之間的旅行將恢復。
